verbs.description: special report ajaokuta steel company natasha akpoti house of reps and [ARG1: the acquisition plot ajaokuta steel company] [V: limited] [ARGM-LOC: in kogi state nigeria] the second largest in africa and 12th largest iron ore in the world has not only been under lock and key but has remained a big centre for massive looting and wastage of the nation resources the federal government has spent over 8bn on the nearly moribund steel plant since its inception the bulk which have been largely expended on the salary of workers of the company who have been idle since the russians abandoned the construction of the gigantic venture in 1994 ajaokuta steel company steel plant ginl ajaokuta complex ajaokuta cooking nigeria limited ajaokuta steel company limited ajaokuta federal government of the united states australian house of representatives natasha akpoti nigeria
